TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComponentDesigner/ShadowPropertyCollection extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示应重写特定属性的继承默认值或分配值的遮盖属性集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of shadow properties that should override inherited default or assigned values for specific properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储的设计时重写这些属性的任何其他值的特定属性的值的集合。 stores a collection of values for specific properties that override any other value for these properties at design time. 这可用于确保特定属性设置为特定值，例如，在后台窗体应始终将其可见的属性设置为的情况下`true`。This is useful for ensuring that a specific property is set to a specific value, for example, in situations when the background form should always have its visible property set to `true`.

span.span: Indicates whether a property matching the specified name exists in the collection.

returns.span: 如果集合中存在此属性，则为 ；否则为 。

summary.span: 获取或设置指定索引处的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object at the specified index.

value.span: 指定的属性值（如果该值存在于集合中）。

span.span: The value of the specified property, if it exists in the collection.

value.span: 否则，将从非隐藏属性的当前值中检索该值。

span.span: Otherwise, the value is retrieved from the current value of the nonshadowed property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性已被隐藏，此方法将返回一个属性的当前值。This method returns the current value of a property, if the property has not been shadowed. 因此，务必确定属性是否通过调用带阴影。Therefore, it is important to determine whether the property is shadowed by calling .
